review: You guys really must give this game a go. It is fast, furious and damned frustrating chasing the extra hundredths of a second needed to grab that next medal. The best part is that you can play a free version of Trackmania - 'Trackmania Nations' - to test it out an the Stadium circuits and see if you like it, then you can jump right in and purchase the full version.World leaderboards and an extensive community for additional track downloads and on-line head to head match races add to the excitement. So what are you waiting for!I give it 4 stars out of 5, cause NO game is beyond improving.
